args.natural_language_statement:
Prove that if |G| = 105 then G has a normal Sylow 5-subgroup and a normal Sylow 7-subgroup.

Translate to Lean4. Import Mathlib at top and end the Lean4 statement with := by sorry.

{"ok": true, "lean_translation": "import Mathlib
open Subgroup
open Finset Nat
open scoped Classical
open Nat
open Subgroup
open Monoid
open Subgroup AddSubgroup

/-- Prove that if |G|=105 then G has a normal Sylow 5 -subgroup and a normal Sylow 7-subgroup. -/
theorem sylow_normal_extracted {G : Type u_1} [Group G] [Fact (Nat.Prime 5)] [Fact (Nat.Prime 7)] :
 Nat.card G = 105 → (∃ P, P ∈ sylow 5 G ∧ P.Normal) ∧ ∃ P, P ∈ sylow 7 G ∧ P.Normal := sorry"}

args.content:
import Mathlib
open Subgroup
open Finset Nat
open scoped Classical
open Nat
open Subgroup
open Monoid
open Subgroup AddSubgroup

/-- Prove that if |G|=105 then G has a normal Sylow 5 -subgroup and a normal Sylow 7-subgroup. -/
theorem sylow_normal_extracted {G : Type u_1} [Group G] [Fact (Nat.Prime 5)] [Fact (Nat.Prime 7)] :
  Nat.card G = 105 → (∃ P, P ∈ sylow 5 G ∧ P.Normal) ∧ ∃ P, P ∈ sylow 7 G ∧ P.Normal := by sorry
